source_sentence: ◎爾時，息華魔眷屬同聲唱言：「世尊！
translation: At that point, the members of the Śākyamuni's retinue called out in unison, Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 我等眷屬隨順佐助，若汝善男子得阿耨多羅三藐三菩提時，當與我等授菩提記。」
translation: If you good sons attain supreme perfect enlightenment, you will give us the assurance of enlightenment.

source_sentence: 息華魔言：「如是，善男子！」
translation: Stopping the flower demon, he said, So it is, good man!

source_sentence: 魔眷屬言：「所有眾生下種於地，收諸果實而受食者，以此善根當令我等得大安樂得大利益。」
translation: The Māra's retinue said, All sentient beings who plant the seeds on the ground and gather the fruits and receive food will use these good roots to cause us to attain great peace and benefit.

source_sentence: 息華魔復白釋迦如來言：「我是護持世尊教法者，我是熾然世尊正法者，
translation: Again, the Māra Śiva said to the Tathāgata Śākyamuni, “I am the one who preserves the teaching of the World-honored One.

source_sentence: 我於此中初作滅飢饉者。
translation: Here, the first thing I do is to extinguish hunger.

source_sentence: 唯願世尊，與我受阿耨多羅三藐三菩提記。」
translation: Please, Bhagavān, give me the assurance of receiving the assurance of unsurpassed, correct, and complete enlightenment.

source_sentence: 時息華魔五輪著地，頭面禮拜釋迦如來足已，却坐一面。
translation: At the time, the five wheels of the Lotus Sutra demon touched the ground, bowed their heads and faces to the feet of the Tathāgata Śākyamuni, and withdrew to sit at one side.

source_sentence: 「汝起勇猛善逝子，　　無垢清淨蓮華面，
translation: “Arise, boldly good enlightening being, On the pure lotus-like countenance of a pure buddha.

source_sentence: 今日能發堅牢願，　　當得第一大菩提。
translation: Today, if you can give rise to a firm vow, you'll attain the first great awakening.

source_sentence: 此諸眾生飢火逼，　　我為至親能救護，
translation: These sentient beings are tormented by hunger and thirst, And I am the one who can rescue them.

source_sentence: 解脫一切眾生者，　　起大悲心當作佛。
translation: Being liberated from all sentient beings, he gives rise to great compassion and becomes a buddha.

source_sentence: 以空無相無願力，　　解脫六趣苦眾生，
translation: By the power of emptiness, signlessness, and wishlessness They liberate suffering beings in the six states of woe.

source_sentence: 恒以虛空清淨法，　　令諸眾生得無垢。
translation: He always uses the pure dharmas of space to cause sentient beings to attain immaculateness.

source_sentence: 不久於此佛剎土，　　當證覺法名勝慧，
translation: Soon, in this buddha-land, they’ll realize the enlightenment called superior wisdom.

source_sentence: 於未來世得作佛，　　勇猛善智降勝怨。」
translation: In the future, they'll become buddhas, and their courageous good knowledge will subdue their enemies.

source_sentence: 爾時，世尊即為息華而說偈言：時息華魔聞是偈已，便生清淨第一歡喜，
translation: At that moment, the World-Honored One spoke these verses to the goddess Śāriputra: When Māra Sāriputra heard these verses, he felt pure and supremely joyful.

source_sentence: 即以天華散於佛上。
translation: He then scattered heavenly flowers over the Buddha.

source_sentence: 爾時，復有菩薩摩訶薩名成就智，即起于坐，向彼十方諸來世尊，先以聲覺，
translation: At that time another great enlightening being, named Accomplished Knowledge, rose from his seat and addressed the world-honored ones of the ten directions:

source_sentence: 作如是言：「唯願世尊一心念我。
translation: He said, Please, Bhagavān, let me be singlemindedly mindful of you.

source_sentence: 所以者何？
translation: Why is that?

source_sentence: 憶我往昔初入賢劫，當於拘留孫佛所發大誓願，普欲成就一切眾生示受女形，
translation: “When I entered the world age of enlightenment in the past, I made a great vow at the feet of Krakucchanda Buddha to develop all sentient beings and show them my female form.

source_sentence: 為令眾生四百四病得消滅故，復取大地精味，散布種種諸草木根，和合四百四味，
translation: In order to cause sentient beings to attain the extinction of four hundred and four kinds of illnesses, they also take the earth's essence and flavor, spread it over various roots of grass and trees, combining the four hundred and four flavors.

source_sentence: 隨藥功能眾生受用病皆消滅。
translation: According to the function of the medicine, all the illnesses that sentient beings experience and use are all extinguished.

source_sentence: 示以根藥四百四種，示以果藥四百四種，示蘇煎藥四百四種，示油煎藥四百四種，
translation: He showed four hundred and four kinds of root medicine, four hundred and four kinds of fruit medicine, four hundred and four kinds of juice-cooked medicine, and four hundred and four kinds of oil-cooked medicine.

source_sentence: 示以寫藥四百四種，示以諸治阿伽陀藥，乃至湯散丸等，總治身分內外眾藥，
translation: He showed them four hundred and four kinds of prescriptions for medicine, and he showed them the antidotes for the agada medicines, up to the bathing and swallowing pills, etc., which were used to treat all the internal and external medicines of body, mind, and body.

source_sentence: 凡有一千四百種類。
translation: There are 1,400 kinds.

source_sentence: 我為成熟諸眾生故，為欲消滅諸病苦故，亦為利益諸眾生故，如是眾藥並皆示之。
translation: Because I want to mature sentient beings, because I want to extinguish the suffering of illnesses, and for the benefit of sentient beings, I show them all these medicines.

source_sentence: 「世尊！
translation: Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 我為拘留孫佛及彼眾會，常作種種駈使給侍，本心希望得授記莂。
translation: For Krakucchanda Buddha and the other assembled monks, I've always done various kinds of deeds to serve them, and my original intention is to hope to be able to give them a prediction.

source_sentence: 是時，拘留孫佛便告我言：『善男子！
translation: Krakucchanda then addressed me, saying, 'Good man!

source_sentence: 未來之世人壽百歲，爾時有佛出現於世，名釋迦牟尼如來、阿羅訶、三藐三佛陀。
translation: In the future, when people's life span will be a hundred years, a Buddha will appear in the world at that time, named Śākyamuni Tathāgata, Arhat, and Samyak-saṃbuddha.

source_sentence: 釋迦如來以大願故，大集諸佛及菩薩眾，汝當於彼得授阿耨多羅三藐三菩提記。』
translation: Because of the great vow, the Śākyamuni Tathāgata gathered a large assembly of buddhas and bodhisattvas, and you will give an assurance of unsurpassed, correct, and complete enlightenment to Peter.'

source_sentence: 從是已來，拘那含如來亦如是說，迦葉如來亦如是說。
translation: Since then, the Tathāgata Kanakamuni has also explained it this way, and so has the Tathāgata Kassapa explained it this way.

source_sentence: 我自昔來久發此願：『乃至恒河沙等大劫，於此佛剎作大藥天，為除眾生一切病故。』
translation: Since long since the distant past, I've made this vow: 'Even for a great eon as numerous as the grains of sand in the Ganges River, I'll create a great medicinal heaven at this buddha-stage to remove all the illnesses of sentient beings.'

source_sentence: 我於彼時，久以大地淳濃精味，布散種種諸藥根枝華葉果實，令諸眾生普得受用，
translation: At that time I spread all kinds of herbs, roots, branches, flowers, leaves, fruits, and so forth with the earth’s unadulterated fragrance to enable sentient beings to experience it.

source_sentence: 及滅內外諸病苦故。
translation: It's because they cease the suffering of internal and external illnesses.

source_sentence: 所有眾生若正和合受用之時，令起無常苦空無我，分別心及心數法轉，
translation: When all sentient beings are correctly combined and experienced, they cause the arising of impermanence, suffering, emptiness, selflessness, discriminating mind and mental factors to develop.

source_sentence: 以此善根令我具足般若波羅蜜。
translation: Because of these good roots, I'll be endowed with the perfection of prajñāpāramitā.

source_sentence: 如是我於此佛剎作大丈夫事。
translation: Thus, I've done a great deed at this buddha-stage.

source_sentence: 如是，如是！
translation: So it is, so it is!

source_sentence: 十方恒河沙等諸世界中以女人形，於一一世界如恒河沙劫，以如是相如是力，
translation: In worlds as numerous as the grains of sand in the Ganges River in the ten directions, each world is like an eon as numerous as grains of sand in the Ganges River with a woman’s form.

source_sentence: 如是勇猛精進，如是劬勞乃至給侍。
translation: Such courageous effort, such diligence, and such labor up to the point of serving as an attendant.

source_sentence: 如是，如是！
translation: So it is, so it is!

source_sentence: 病苦眾生令成熟故，然後我身當得阿耨多羅三藐三菩提。
translation: Because sentient beings suffering from illness cause them to mature, then I will attain unsurpassed, correct, and complete enlightenment.

source_sentence: 及我今日復於佛前增進本願，與此息華作大功德其心堅固，常為佐助無有劬勞。
translation: Today, I'll again advance my original vow in front of the Buddha, give it to this calming flower as a great merit, make their minds resolute, and always assist them without any trouble.

source_sentence: 我等二人共為女形同一色貌，為欲成熟諸眾生故，乃至倍加成熟諸女人故。
translation: Together we are the same color and shape as women because we want to bring sentient beings to maturity, up to the point where we doubly mature women.

source_sentence: 今我二人取地精氣和合飲食，令諸香味悉皆具足，老病眾生食此味者，
translation: Now we both take the energy of the earth and combine it with food and drink, enabling all its fragrances to be fully present. Those old and sick who eat this taste

source_sentence: 一切病患皆得消滅，以此勝因令我具足般若波羅蜜。
translation: All illnesses will all be extinguished, and this excellent cause will cause me to fulfill the perfection of the perfection of prajñāpāramitā.

source_sentence: 若我得阿耨多羅三藐三菩提者，願佛世尊攝受我等為稱善哉。
translation: If I attain supreme perfect enlightenment, may the Bhagavān take us in and call us good!

source_sentence: 若佛世尊同與我等菩提記者，願為我等稱讚善哉。」
translation: If the Bhagavān were to share our enlightenment, please praise it for us as good.

source_sentence: 爾時，世尊稱讚成就智菩薩言：「善哉，善哉！
translation: It was then that the Bhagavān praised the accomplished bodhisattva of wisdom, saying, Good, good!

source_sentence: 善男子！
translation: Good sons!

source_sentence: 汝能如是作大利益丈夫，即為成就智菩薩。」
translation: If you can thus become a great benefactor, that's the bodhisattva who has accomplished wisdom.

source_sentence: 「汝為世間病者醫，　　能持諸根得安樂，
translation: You are the doctor for the sick in the world. You can maintain your faculties and attain well-being.

source_sentence: 蓮華清淨最上剎，　　得佛號毘盧遮那。」
translation: The lotus flower is the purest and highest buddha, and he attains the Buddha's name Vairocana.

source_sentence: 而說偈言：持地菩薩摩訶薩亦作是願，以女人形化度眾生，如地持物悕念授記。
translation: He spoke a verse, saying, The earth-holding bodhisattva Mahāsattva also makes this vow to save sentient beings in the form of a woman, just as the earth-holding bodhisattva remembers and predicts with compassion.

source_sentence: 「汝如大地持一切，　　今當速得所希念，
translation: You are like the great earth, sustaining all things. Now you should quickly attain what you seek.

source_sentence: 剎名勝攝功德滿，　　作佛名曰智自在。」
translation: The buddha's name is superior in gathering merit and being a buddha is called the master of wisdom.

source_sentence: 釋迦如來為說偈言：智上菩薩願受女形化度一切，作如是念悕得授記。
translation: The Śākyamuni Tathāgata spoke a verse for him, saying, A bodhisattva of superior wisdom wishes to receive the form of a woman and transform all people, and he has this thought that he'll be given a prediction.

source_sentence: 「汝智充足諸眾生，　　及以華果方便攝，
translation: “Your knowledge satisfies all sentient beings, And it’s collected by means of flowers and fruits.

source_sentence: 未曾聞剎上清淨，　　得佛名為上勝因。」
translation: I've never heard that the buddhas are purified above the bases, and they attain the Buddha's name as the superior cause.

source_sentence: 釋迦如來為說偈言：示現灰菩薩作女人形，受用火事成熟眾生，願得授記。
translation: The Śākyamuni Tathāgata spoke these verses for him, saying, Showing the bodhisattva A Forest of Pearls from the Dharma Garden, Volume II ashes to take on the form of a woman in order to ripen sentient beings who experience the effects of fire and wish to be given assurance of future enlightenment.

source_sentence: 「示諸世間無常想，　　成熟眾生於菩提，
translation: Showing the world impermanent conceptions, They mature sentient beings to enlightenment.

source_sentence: 剎名生塵最吉祥，　　於彼作佛名燈火。」
translation: The blaze is called the most auspicious among the dust that arises, and it's called the lamp-fire when it becomes buddha there.

source_sentence: 釋迦如來為說偈言：動眾生離塵菩薩願作女形，為成熟眾生故受用風事，
translation: The Buddha Śākyamuni spoke these verses for them: Enlightening beings who move sentient beings and are free from dust wish to take the form of a woman. In order to mature sentient beings they receive the service of wind.

source_sentence: 悕念授記。
translation: I'll recite the assurance of future enlightenment.

source_sentence: 「搖動眾生令歡喜，　　能令煩惱究竟滅，
translation: shakes sentient beings and makes them rejoice, Able to cause the ultimate extinction of afflictions.

source_sentence: 剎名清淨現平等，　　當得作佛號月光。」
translation: The blaze is called pure and equal in appearance, and it will become the moonlight of the Buddha's name.

source_sentence: 釋迦如來為說偈言：無障礙燈菩薩願作女形，為成熟眾生故受用虛空事，
translation: The Buddha Śākyamuni spoke these verses for them:

source_sentence: 亦悕授記。
translation: He also gave a prediction of future enlightenment.

source_sentence: 「得無依智清淨者，　　能說無上正覺道，
translation: “Those who attain the purity of independent knowledge can teach the supreme path of enlightenment,

source_sentence: 剎名調障無染著，　　當得作佛號智上。」
translation: The buddhas are called the dharmas that tame the hindrances without defiled attachment, and they'll become buddhas named above wisdom.

source_sentence: 釋迦如來為說偈言：妙香說菩薩願作女形，為成熟故受用華事，為菩提故悕望授記。
translation: The Śākyamuni Tathāgata spoke a verse for him, saying, Marvelous fragrance explains that the bodhisattva wishes to take the form of a woman, receive flowers for the sake of ripening and hopes to give them as assurance for the sake of enlightenment.

source_sentence: 「現作香華普供養，　　開示諸佛無上道，
translation: They now offer incense and flowers to all, Teaching the buddhas the unexcelled path.

source_sentence: 蓮華藏剎清淨土，　　得佛號普香如來。」
translation: In the pure land of the lotus-treasury buddha, he'll attain the Buddha's name, Samantabhadra Tathāgata.

source_sentence: 釋迦如來為說偈言：袈裟色菩薩願作女形，為成熟眾生故，受用種種染色，
translation: The Buddha Śākyamuni spoke these verses: The bodhisattva dressed in the form of a monk’s robe wishes to take the form of a woman.

source_sentence: 願得授記。
translation: May I be granted a prediction?

source_sentence: 「以袈裟衣利眾生，　　相應供養三寶種，
translation: To benefit sentient beings with robes, they should offer the seeds of the Three Treasures to each other.

source_sentence: 青光剎中最無上，　　當得作佛號寶光。」
translation: It's the highest among the blue-light buddhas, and it will become the jeweled radiance of the Buddha's name.

source_sentence: 釋迦如來為說偈言：爾時，無量諸種子天林天果天，乃至六十七俱胝那由他百千菩薩摩訶薩，
translation: The Tathāgata Śākyamuni spoke these verses for them: At that time, innumerable bodhisattva mahāsattvas of the seed-heaven, the celestial forest, the celestial fruit-heaven, and so on, numbering one hundred thousand trillion sixty-seven koṭis of sentient beings.

source_sentence: 為欲成熟諸眾生故，倍為度脫諸女人，故作女人形，發願同得阿耨多羅三藐三菩提記。
translation: Because they want to ripen sentient beings and doubly liberate women, they take the form of a woman and make the vow to attain unsurpassed, correct, and complete enlightenment together.

source_sentence: 釋迦如來各說一偈各得記莂。
translation: Each of the Śākyamuni Tathāgatas spoke one verse, and each got a  write-off.

source_sentence: 何以故？
translation: Why is it so?

source_sentence: 轉男為女其事則易，轉女作男其事則難。
translation: It's easy to change a man into a woman, but it's difficult to change a woman into a man.

source_sentence: 是時百俱胝諸大龍王及諸小龍，同作是願悕望授記。
translation: At the time, hundreds of koṭīs of great dragon kings and other small dragons together made this vow to wish for a prediction.

source_sentence: 釋迦如來各說一偈授菩提記。
translation: Each of the Śākyamuni Tathāgatas spoke a verse to confer the assurance of enlightenment.

source_sentence: 復有六萬四千頻婆，及八十俱胝阿修羅，七十阿閦毘俱胝那由他百千諸天及諸天女，
translation: Again, there were sixty-four thousand vipaśyanīs and eighty koṭis of asuras. Seventy abhikūṭis made up one hundred thousand devas and goddesses:

source_sentence: 九十九頻婆俱胝百千諸魔及其眷屬，乃至恒河沙等人、非人眾，及剎利、婆羅門、毘舍、首陀、男子、女人、童男、童女，
translation: Hundreds of thousands of Māras, their retinues, as many as the sands of the Ganges River, and other non-human beings, as well as kṣatriyas, brāhmaṇas, vaiśyas, śūdras, men, women, boys, and girls.

source_sentence: 亦皆同心悕望阿耨多羅三藐三菩提記。
translation: They all share the same mind and aspire to unsurpassed, correct, and complete enlightenment.

source_sentence: 如是等類，一一各得一偈授記。
translation: Each of these kinds of people receives a verse of assurance.

source_sentence: 過於數量天、龍、夜叉、乾闥婆、阿修羅、迦樓羅、緊那羅、摩睺羅伽、薜荔多、毘舍遮、人、非人等未發心者，
translation: It's beyond the number of gods, dragons, yakṣas, gandharvas, asuras, garuḍas, kiṃnaras, mahoragas, Kauṇḍinyas, Vaiśravaṇas, humans, non-humans, and so forth who haven't yet arisen the intention.

source_sentence: 今於佛前同發阿耨多羅三藐三菩提心。
translation: Now, they'll all give rise to the mind of unsurpassed, correct, and complete enlightenment in front of the Buddha.

source_sentence: 過於數量眾生住阿毘跋致地，過於數量眾生得菩薩種種三昧忍陀羅尼，
translation: “Great enlightening beings have attained the state of unexcelled, perfect enlightenment.

source_sentence: 過於數量眾生漏盡離欲得阿羅漢果，亦過數量眾生迴聲聞辟支佛心，住佛阿毘跋致地。
translation: More than a number of sentient beings who have ended the contaminants and become free of desire attain the fruit of arhatship, more than a number of sentient beings return to the minds of śrāvakas and pratyekbuddhas and abide in the Buddha's abhidharma stage.

source_sentence: 如是等一切同聲而作是言：「我等依一切諸佛教故受此法門，若有受持讀誦書寫此法門者，
translation: They all said in unison, “We accept this teaching on the basis of all buddha-teachings. If there is anyone who receives, retains, recites, and copies this teaching,

source_sentence: 我及眷屬，當共如法供給供養。」
translation: We and our retinues will make offerings together according to the teaching.

source_sentence: ◎◎寶星陀羅尼經慈愍品第九爾時，釋迦牟尼如來復作是言：「一切諸佛，
translation: Jewel- Stars Dhāraṇī of the Scripture on Compassion At that time, the Tathāgata Śākyamuni again spoke these words:

source_sentence: 若憐愍此佛剎眾生來相問訊者，當一心念。
translation: If you have pity for the sentient beings in this buddha-stage who come to ask questions, you should singlemindedly think.

source_sentence: 此息華善男子等，欲令眾生得衣服飲食及諸藥物，隨心受用令充足者，
translation: Good sons, these flowers of calmness want to cause sentient beings to obtain clothing, food, drink, and medicine, and they follow their hearts and experience it appropriately so that they will be satisfied.

source_sentence: 又以女人形相，於阿耨多羅三藐三菩提成熟眾生者，一切諸佛應當加護是息華等令願滿足。
translation: Also, if a woman's form and characteristics ripen sentient beings in unsurpassed, correct, and complete enlightenment, all the buddhas should guard these flowers of calmness and so forth to fulfill their vow.

source_sentence: 如彼善男子所願，如其所欲如其所為，隨彼種種所須衣服飲食并諸藥物，
translation: They follow the wishes of those sons of a virtuous family and do as they wish, according to their wishes; they provide them with whatever clothing, food, drink, and medicine they need.

source_sentence: 若化施設皆令滿足，使諸眾生所須供侍隨意受用，即發心時如是等事悉得成就，
translation: If he fulfills all his teachings and instructions, enabling sentient beings to receive the offerings they need, he accomplishes these things at the moment of their arousal of mind.

source_sentence: 彼善男子能作如是建立丈夫所作之事。」
translation: That good man can thus establish the things that a husband does.

source_sentence: 諸佛世尊，依大悲功德定慧莊嚴，憶念眾生作如是言：「以此神呪章句施與汝等，
translation: The buddhas and world-honored ones, relying on the adornment of great compassion, virtue, concentration, and wisdom, remembered sentient beings and said to them, Give this chapter and verse of the divine spell to you,

source_sentence: 隨意所願皆令具足，一切善根所依，一切三世諸佛世尊所共受持。」
translation: Whatever they wish, they'll be fulfilled, and all the good roots that they rely on will be shared by all the buddhas and world-honored ones of the three times.

source_sentence: 即說呪曰：「哆地也他樹柢婆婆(一)　地履底婆婆(二)　牟尼婆婆(三)　娑底也婆婆(四)　否若楞迦囉婆婆地也娜(五)　囉娑摩呵迦嘍拏婆婆(六)　摩呵婆囉哆婆婆(七)　阿慕呵婆婆(八)　樓底婆婆(九)　差底婆婆(十)　娑履聞婆婆(十一)　佉伽婆婆(十二)　婆誘婆婆(十三)　伐哆婆婆(十四)　阿地所吒娜婆婆(十五)　阿摩婆婆(十六)　阿呵娜婆婆(十七)　哆他多婆婆(十八)　部哆句致婆婆(十九)　涅鼻履底婆婆(二十)　底履鳩捨閜婆婆(二十一)　底履夜娜婆婆(二十二)　哆疑駄計迦婆婆婆(二十三)　底履毘慕去所婆婆(二十四)　底履首迦羅婆婆(二十五)　囉所吒囉地所吒娜婆婆(二十六)　婆婆婆婆婆婆(二十七)　娑摩多(二十八)　阿娜若婆摩哆(二十九)　吒吒吒吒吒吒吒所咤死地(三十)　薩婆鳩捨邏地(三十一)　所咤那也(三十二)　娑婆呵(三十三)「善男子！
translation: He then spoke the dhāraṇī, saying, Tathāgata-yataśambara(a) 地履底婆婆(b) 牟尼婆婆(c) 娑底也婆婆(d) 否若楞迦囉婆婆地也娜(e) 囉娑摩呵迦澡婆婆(f) 摩呵婆囉哆婆婆哆婆婆(g) 阿慕呵

source_sentence: 此一切法平等神呪，能令一切悕望者悉皆滿足，汝等眷屬應當受持，令一切眾生隨所受用皆得成熟，
translation: These spiritual spells of equality in all things, able to satisfy all those who long for enlightenment, your followers should accept and uphold them, so that all sentient beings may attain maturity according to their needs.

source_sentence: 能令汝等菩提行滿足故。」
translation: It's because it will cause you to fulfill the practice of enlightenment.

source_sentence: 爾時，息華、勝天、成智、天地、持天等而為上首，與十千菩薩俱，為令眾生隨所受用得成熟故，
translation: At that time the chief leaders of the assembly were Saṃkusumitarāja, Maheśvara, Sakkavyūha, Brahmadeva, gods and goddesses who had attained buddhahood. They were there together with ten thousand enlightening beings to cause sentient beings to develop and mature according to their needs and capacities.

source_sentence: 以女人形勤勞化度，一時同聲，作如是言：「由此呪力，諸佛世尊令我所願皆得滿足。
translation: Through the power of this spell, the buddhas and world-honored ones will cause me to fulfill all my wishes.

source_sentence: 如是神呪，能與我等作大加護，能令我等得無上智，是故我等當共受持此陀羅尼，
translation: Such a magic spell as this can give us great protection and cause us to attain the highest wisdom. For this reason we should all accept and uphold this dhāraṇī.

source_sentence: 欲令一切眾生悉成熟故，以大勤勞供給所須。
translation: Because they want to cause all sentient beings to fully mature, they provide what's needed with great diligence.

source_sentence: 今於一切如來前，願一切眾生普得成熟住於自解。
translation: Now, in front of all the Tathāgatas, may all sentient beings universally attain maturation and abide in their own understanding.

source_sentence: 若有天乃至人，於如來所說妙法，欲破壞散滅者，我若不勤方便遮障令妙法久住者，
translation: If there are gods or even humans who want to destroy and disperse the wonderful teaching taught by the Tathāgata, then if I don’t diligently skillfully obstruct them so that the wonderful teaching will abide for a long time,

source_sentence: 我等則為欺誑一切三世諸佛世尊，亦莫令我得阿耨多羅三藐三菩提。
translation: We then deceive all the buddhas and world-honored ones of the three times, and don't let us attain unsurpassed, correct, and complete enlightenment.

source_sentence: 「若有善男子、若天，乃至若人，欲惱亂比丘、比丘尼、優婆塞、優婆夷，
translation: “If there are good men, gods, or even people who want to disturb monks, nuns, laymen, and laymen,

source_sentence: 我等若不勤作方便遮障，令彼憂惱不消滅者，我等則為欺誑一切三世諸佛世尊，
translation: If we do not diligently undertake skillful means to hinder those afflictions so that they will not be extinguished, we deceive all the buddhas and world-honored ones of the three times.

source_sentence: 亦令我等莫得菩提。
translation: It also prevents us from attaining enlightenment.

source_sentence: 「若有求無上菩提善男子、善女人，有遭水火、毒害、厭蠱、熱病、溫瘧等病，
translation: “If there are good men and good women who seek unsurpassed enlightenment, they’ll be afflicted by water, fire, poison, disgust, heat, fever, malaria, and other illnesses.

source_sentence: 或一日、二日、三日、四日數發動者，如是等畏，乃至天、龍、夜叉、迦吒富單那、剎利、婆羅門、毘舍、首陀，
translation: Or if they do so for one day, two days, three days, or four days in succession, such fears will arise, up to gods, dragons, yakṣas, kaṭa-putra, kṣatriyas, brāhmaṇas, vaiśyas, and śūdras.

source_sentence: 師子犬等，疾疫飢渴種種厄難諸餘災惱，有是等畏者，以此一切諸佛所持一切悕求滿足陀羅尼神呪章句，
translation: The lion dogs and so forth, the diseases, epidemics, hunger, thirst, various calamities, and other calamities that are feared by those with these kinds of fear cause all the buddhas to maintain all the scriptures, spells, spells, spells, spells, spells, spells, spells, spells, spells, spells,

source_sentence: 令誦念者悉得解脫，唯除先世決定業障。
translation: He causes those who recite it to attain liberation, except for the karmic hindrance of certainty from prior lives.

source_sentence: 若我等不除彼障，則為欺誑一切三世諸佛世尊，亦莫令我得阿耨多羅三藐三菩提。」
translation: If we don't remove those hindrances, then we'll deceive all the buddhas and world-honored ones of the three times and won't allow us to attain unsurpassed, correct, and complete enlightenment.

source_sentence: 時彼一切諸佛世尊，同來此佛剎集會者，皆稱是言：「善哉！
translation: All those buddhas and world-honored ones who came to this buddha-stage together at the same time called it, saying, Good!

source_sentence: 善哉！
translation: Excellent, good!

source_sentence: 善男子！
translation: Good sons!

source_sentence: 汝等所願甚為勝妙，能作如是大丈夫所作事。」
translation: What you wish for is so wonderful that you'll be able to do such a great deed.

source_sentence: 「於諸來佛當起信，　　應生最上歡喜心，
translation: You should give rise to faith in the Buddhas of the future, And become supremely joyful.

source_sentence: 為菩提故生慶幸，　　應當速發利他意。
translation: Being blessed for the sake of enlightenment, they should quickly give rise to the intention to benefit others.

source_sentence: 汝魔境界無親友，　　亦無所欲如意者，
translation: Your demonic realm has no friends or relatives, And there is nothing to desire or wish.

source_sentence: 汝以無力失魔業，　　何能等類我牟尼？」
translation: You've lost the demonic activity because of your powerlessness, so how can you be like me, the sage?

source_sentence: 「我無一念信菩提，　　心亦不作歡喜想，
translation: “Without a thought of faith in enlightenment, Nor do I conceive the thought of joy.

source_sentence: 語汝牟尼且默然，　　我亦自有親友者。
translation: Tell you, Muni, be silent! I also have my own friends and relatives.

source_sentence: 由彼親友我有力，　　我今住於自境界，
translation: Because of the power of their friends and relatives, I am now in my own sphere.

source_sentence: 我有最上威德力，　　盡汝壽命我不從。」
translation: I have the most authoritative power, and I won't obey it for as long as you live.

source_sentence: 爾時，釋迦如來即為魔王而說偈言：於是惡魔復說偈言：寶星陀羅尼經擁護品第十之一爾時，
translation: At that time the Buddha Śākyamuni, the Tathāgata, spoke these verses to the Māra king:

source_sentence: 會中有佛世尊名曼陀羅香，白釋迦如來言：「彼過去諸佛，從種種剎土中來於五濁佛剎大集時，
translation: In the assembly, there was a buddha world-honored one named maṇḍala fragrance who said to the Tathāgata Śākyamuni, “These buddhas of the past came from various buddha-lands at the time of the great assembly in the five turbid buddha-lands.

source_sentence: 並共擁護此法門也，亦令無量俱胝魔眾自然退散；
translation: Together they embraced this teaching and caused the innumerable Licchavi demons to naturally retreat.

source_sentence: 以慈悲眼視諸眾生，有惡見者皆令解脫，熾然智炬安置眾生於吉祥道，
translation: With the eye of kindness and compassion he looked out for all sentient beings, enabling those with bad views to be liberated. He burned the torch of knowledge and placed sentient beings on the auspicious path.

source_sentence: 說此金剛法等緣法心建立摧碎陀羅尼印章句差別門記法門之時，為令惡黨悉皆退散建立法幢。
translation: When he teaches this adamantine teaching and so forth, he establishes the dhāraṇī of destroying the mind that takes the Dharma as a condition to establish the Dhāraṇī of Destruction in order to cause all bad people to retreat and scatter the Dharma banner.

source_sentence: 如是，如是！
translation: So it is, so it is!

source_sentence: 我等十方諸佛今日住世，亦為將養憐愍諸眾生故，亦於穢惡五濁佛剎同作大集，
translation: Because we buddhas of the ten directions are living in the world today, and because we want to nourish sentient beings with compassion, we have also created a great assembly together at the defiled five turbid buddha-lands.

source_sentence: 擁護如此微妙法門，乃至建立無上法幢。
translation: He embraces such a subtle teaching and establishes the unsurpassed Dharma banner.

source_sentence: 釋迦佛日滅度之後，誰能於此剎土，當作第一護持妙法，當令正法熾然流布，
translation: Who will be able to preserve the sublime Dharma foremost in this buddha-land after the parinirvāṇa of the Buddha Śākyamuni Buddha on that day? They will spread the true teaching blazing with energy.

source_sentence: 當使眾生普皆成熟，入此大集數者？
translation: Will you cause all sentient beings to be universally mature and enter this great collection?

source_sentence: 我等以此法門付囑誰手。」
translation: To whom will we entrust this teaching of the Dharma?

source_sentence: 釋迦如來白曼陀羅香如來言：「所有舊住此佛剎者，得忍菩薩及釋梵護世、天、龍、夜叉、乾闥婆、阿修羅、緊那羅、摩睺羅伽等王，
translation: The Buddha Śākyamuni said to the Tathāgata Maṇḍalapāda: All those who formerly lived in this buddha-stage are bodhisattvas of forbearance, as well as Brahmā and other world guardian gods such as Indra, Brahma, gods, nāgas, yakṣas, gandharvas, asuras, kinnaras, mahoragas,

source_sentence: 勤加擁護此妙法門，及此世界四天下中舊住眾生，於此法門生淨信者，
translation: They diligently embraced and protected this teaching of the Teaching, as well as all the sentient beings who lived in the past under the four continents in this world.

source_sentence: 釋梵護世乃至摩睺羅伽王等，以此陀羅尼印清淨法門付其手中。」
translation: Śākyamuni, Brahmā, world protectors, and even the mahoraga kings give this dhāraṇī seal of purity as a pure dharma-gate to their hands.

source_sentence: 是時，曼陀羅香如來，以無障礙圓滿之聲遍此佛剎，作如是言：「諸善男子！
translation: The Tathāgata Maṇḍala Fragrance then pervaded the Buddha's buddha-stage with an unobstructed, perfect voice that said, Good sons!

source_sentence: 諦聽！
translation: Listen attentively!

source_sentence: 諦聽！
translation: Listen attentively!

source_sentence: 所有來此佛剎者，諸如來、阿羅訶、三藐三佛陀難得興世，及一切諸佛世尊，
translation: All the buddhas, arhats, and samyak-saṃbuddhas who have come to these buddha-lands are rarely able to appear in the world.

source_sentence: 於一剎那頃集一佛剎亦甚為難。
translation: It's also very difficult to gather a single buddha-stage in a single moment of time.

source_sentence: 如此一切諸佛世尊，憐愍汝等故來此集，攝受一切諸眾生故，護持諸佛大法門故，
translation: All these buddhas, world-honored ones, out of pity for you, have come to this assembly to receive all sentient beings and preserve the great doctrine of the buddhas.

source_sentence: 置立無上道故。
translation: It's because it establishes the unsurpassed path.

source_sentence: 一切諸佛入三世數者，今日護持一切地界、一切水界、一切火界、一切風界、一切空界，
translation: All the buddhas who enter into the calculations of the three worlds today protect all the earth realms, all the water realms, all the fire realms, all the wind realms, and all the sky realms.

source_sentence: 令此妙法久住世故，令三寶種不斷絕故，成熟一切諸眾生故，乃至度彼生死岸故。」
translation: It's because it causes this marvelous teaching to remain in the world for a long time, causes the seeds of the Three Treasures not to be cut off, matures all sentient beings, and saves them from the shore of birth-and-death.

source_sentence: 爾時，一切諸佛世尊，及諸佛剎舊住菩薩摩訶薩，釋梵護世、天、龍、夜叉、乾闥婆、阿修羅、迦樓羅、緊那羅、摩睺羅伽等王，
translation: At the time, all the buddhas, world-honored ones, as well as the formerly abiding bodhisattvas and mahāsattvas of the buddha-stage buddha-lands, Indra, Brahma, world protectors, gods, dragons, yakṣas, gandharvas, asuras, garuḍas, kiṃnaras, mahoragas, and other kings

source_sentence: 及諸餘精氣中有大精氣眾生，乃至所有四天下世界居住者，彼一切眾作如是言：「善男子！
translation: And all the other sentient beings with great energy in their vitality, even those living in the worlds of the four continents, all said, Good sons!

source_sentence: 我等以此諸佛所護正法重付囑汝，為令眾生普成熟故。
translation: Because we entrust to you the true teaching protected by these buddhas, in order to cause sentient beings to be universally mature.

source_sentence: 汝等常應熾然如是不滅壞法不墜沒法。
translation: You should always be blazing like this, which doesn't cease and disintegrate dharmas and doesn't fall down dharmas.

source_sentence: 若有信心善男子、善女人，當共受持書寫大集法門，乃至比丘、比丘尼、優婆塞、優婆夷，
translation: If they believe in faith, good men and good women should jointly memorize and write the great collection of teachings together, up to monks, bhikṣus, nuns, laymen, and laywomen.

source_sentence: 彼等一切諸善男子，受持誦念此法門者，汝等常當擁護供給，以此法門如法付囑。
translation: All of those good men who memorize and recite this teaching, you must always guard it and offer it as an entrustment in accordance with the teaching.

source_sentence: 若法師樂求法、樂禪定、樂聽法、樂持法者，汝等宜應擁護乃至供給。
translation: If the teacher of the Dharma delights in seeking the Dharma, delights in meditation, delights in listening to the Dharma, and delights in upholding the Dharma, you should embrace and even offer support.

source_sentence: 何以故？
translation: Why is it so?

source_sentence: 所有過去如來、阿羅呵、三藐三佛陀，彼一切如來，亦於穢惡五濁佛剎集者，
translation: All the past buddhas, arhats, samyak-saṃbuddhas, and all those buddhas also assembled in the defiled, five turbid buddha-lands.

source_sentence: 共以妙法付囑釋梵護世故，令此妙法不隱沒故，護持未來傳法人故，乃至成熟一切眾生故。
translation: Together, they entrust the marvelous teaching to Śākyamuni and Brahmā to protect the world, so that this marvelous teaching won't be hidden, up to the point where it protects future heirs and ripens all sentient beings.

source_sentence: 如是，如是。
translation: So it is, so it is.

source_sentence: 所有當來十方諸佛，於五濁世一剎那頃，普皆雲集利益眾生故，當說陀羅尼，
translation: “Furthermore, all the buddhas of the ten directions who will come in the future are like clouds gathered together for the benefit of sentient beings during a single instant in the five turbid worlds.

source_sentence: 當擁護妙法，當付囑釋梵護世等，當供給所須，我等今者，亦復如是。
translation: They will embrace the wonderful Dharma, entrust it to the Śākyamunis, Brahmās, world protectors, and so forth, and provide what they need. We are now exactly like this.

source_sentence: 「汝此佛剎諸舊住者，及四天下釋梵護世、天、龍、夜叉、乾闥婆、阿修羅、迦樓羅、緊那羅、摩睺羅伽等王，
translation: “Your majesty, the ancient inhabitants of this buddha-stage and the world guardian gods Śakra and Brahma of the four quarters, as well as devas, nāgas, yakṣas, gandharvas, asuras, garuḍas, kiṃnaras, mahoragas, and other kings of the four quarters of the earth are likewise.

source_sentence: 倍加付囑，未來之世倍加擁護，倍加供給故，汝亦如是應當憶念，如金剛不可壞法廣令熾然。
translation: Because it's doubly entrusted, doubly protected in future lives, and doubly provided for, you should also thus remember, like the adamantine Dharma that makes it abundant and blazing.

source_sentence: 若有信心護持此法善男子、善女人，及受持此法比丘、比丘尼、優婆塞、優婆夷，
translation: If there are faithful men and women who preserve this doctrine of the Dharma, good men and good women, and monks, bhikṣuṇīs, laymen, and laywomen who uphold it,

source_sentence: 乃至但書持經卷安置家中者，有能說法及樂聽者，有勤修禪定受持法者，
translation: Those who simply write and preserve fascicles of scriptures and place them in their houses are those who can expound the Dharma and listen to it with joy. Some diligently practice meditation and receive and uphold the Dharma.

source_sentence: 汝等皆當護彼善心供養供給。
translation: You should all guard their good intentions and make offerings.

source_sentence: 何以故？
translation: Why is it so?

source_sentence: 一切諸佛普皆受持此法門故，隨所有處，若村、若城、若國中、若邊地、若王宮內、若阿練若處，
translation: Because all buddhas universally accept and uphold this teaching, wherever they may be: in villages, cities, countries, frontier lands, kingdoms, palaces, or monasteries.

source_sentence: 若流通此法門，若開示宣說，若授與人，若能溫誦，乃至但書寫經卷安置家中者，
translation: If someone circulates this teaching, teaches it, explains it, teaches it to others, recites it with warmth, or simply writes a sūtra and puts it at home.

source_sentence: 是等眾生以此法力故，能令地味及眾生精氣悉皆增長。
translation: Because of the power of this teaching, these sentient beings can cause the taste of the earth and the energy of sentient beings to all grow.

source_sentence: 「汝等以彼精氣光澤，精進勇健皆得增長，亦令眷屬及其田宅增長豐饒，
translation: “Your energy shines brightly and brilliantly, your energy is energetic and vigorous. All of you can grow in strength by means of that energy. You will also increase the prosperity of your followers and their fields.

source_sentence: 當令人王常得擁護勢力自在，亦當擁護王之化內以彼法味常令充足。
translation: They will cause the king to always attain the power of embracing, and they will also embrace the king's transformation within him so that he'll always make it abundant with the flavor of his teaching.

source_sentence: 閻浮提內諸人王等，當生和合相利益心，恒信業報，種善根心無慳悋心，
translation: The kings of the people in Jambudvfpa should give rise to a mind of harmony and benefit, always believing in the results of their actions, planting roots of goodness without stinginess.

source_sentence: 常於一切眾生作利益心，常於一切眾生起慈愍心，乃至令王能生正見。
translation: They always think of all sentient beings for their benefit, always have compassion for all sentient beings, and cause the king to be able to give rise to right views.

source_sentence: 各各於己國土自生喜樂，能令具足行善之人充滿其國，豐樂倍常，地土精味自然倍勝，
translation: Each gave rise to his own joy and happiness in his own land. He was able to cause those who were well endowed with virtuous practices to fill that land. Their prosperity and happiness doubled, and the fragrance of the land naturally doubled.

source_sentence: 花果藥物無不甘美，穀米財寶亦倍增多，觸處可樂。
translation: Flowers, fruits, and medicines were all delicious. Grain and rice treasuries also doubled in value, and the place where they touched them was pleasant.

source_sentence: 一切人民無病苦者，一切鬪諍他方怨敵，蚊虻毒蛇惡鬼羅剎，惡禽惡獸豺狼師子，
translation: All people are free of illness and suffering, all fight enemies from other directions, mosquitoes, gadflies, poisonous snakes, bad ghosts, rājas, bad birds, bad animals, jackals, wolves, lions,

source_sentence: 非時風雨，如是惡事悉當消滅。
translation: When it's not the right time for wind and rain, such bad things will all cease.

source_sentence: 晝夜常宿一月半月，時節年歲悉皆正行。
translation: Day and night are always the same for one month and a half months. The seasons, years, and years all move in an orderly fashion.

source_sentence: 是諸眾生多行十善，於彼命終皆生天上，還與汝等而作眷屬。
translation: These sentient beings often perform the ten good deeds, and when their lives end, they'll all be born in heaven and return with you as their followers.

source_sentence: 如是無量功德甚多，皆由稱揚一切諸佛大法陀羅尼法門故。
translation: Such immeasurable merit is so great because it praises the dhāraṇī teachings of all the buddhas' great qualities.

source_sentence: 是諸眾生皆度生死此岸得入無餘，名聞增長果報滿足，所種女身現生後受，
translation: These sentient beings are all liberated from this shore of birth and death, enter it without remainder, and are called having the fruit of hearing grow in maturity. The female body that they sow is experienced now and after birth.

source_sentence: 以法力故，如是等身一切皆盡。
translation: Because of the power of the Dharma, all such bodies are exhausted.

source_sentence: ◎寶星陀羅尼經卷第八
translation: Jeweled Star Dhāraṇī Sutra, Volume 8
